problem.markdown:
What frequency clock source will produce clock waveforms having a period equal to 5 us (5 microseconds)? () 5 MHz (x) 0.2 MHz () 2 MHz () 10 MHz
On what parameters do the output of D flip flop depend? () independent of both previous state and input () both on previous state and input () only on the previous state (x) only on input D
Which statement is false about D latch () the output follows the input everytime (x) the output follows the input when clock is high () the output follows the input when the clock is low () the output never follows the input
Which latch has the property of either retaining or toggling the previous value () D-Latch (x) T-Latch () SR-Latch () None of the above
Which statement below is the apt definition of flip flop () latch () coupled latch () de-coupled latch (x) clocked latch
What kind of flip flop is generally preffered for constructing counters? () JK-flip flop (x) T flip flop () D flip flop () none of the above
What is meant by the problem of metastability in flip flop (x) The data and the control input changes at the instant of clock pulse () The data and the control input does not change at all () The clock input does not change at all () None of the above
